mapper.update: update dealer set status = -1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select dealer_id AS dealerId, cn_name AS cnName, en_name AS enName, a_name AS aName, website AS website, address AS address, registration_time AS registrationTime, plate_number AS plateNumber, telephone AS telephone, dealer_type AS dealerType, main_product AS mainProduct, main_vehicle AS mainVehicle, authentication AS authentication, remark AS remark, is_deleted AS isDeleted, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_time AS updateTime from dealer where dealer_id = #{dealerId} and is_deleted = 0

select dealer_id AS dealerId, cn_name AS cnName, en_name AS enName, a_name AS aName, website AS website, address AS address, registration_time AS registrationTime, plate_number AS plateNumber, telephone AS telephone, dealer_type AS dealerType, main_product AS mainProduct, main_vehicle AS mainVehicle, authentication AS authentication, remark AS remark, is_deleted AS isDeleted, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_time AS updateTime from dealer
